descriptionNullable:
### Context

Each and every day we are buying goods and products and most of them coming in package. 
Since the recycling is meant to be positive approach lots of people started segregate the waste, based on labels and symbols.

This dataset is a small part of my wider object detection project. I decided to share the dataset with 21 classes of different package recycle symbols for beginners to try DNNs for their classification.

### Acknowledgements

All pictures are taken from local shops in Poland.


### Inspiration

Hope you will learn not only image classification but also learn the meaning of the recycling symbols so you also can make a positive impact on our ecology! 

P.S. small hint - black and white images might boost you accuracy ;)
title: Recycle Symbols Classification Dataset
subtitle: Classification of international recycling symbols
description:
